name: Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for
wounds. It restores the HP of one
Pokémon by just 20 points.

name: Max Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for
wounds. It completely restores the HP
of a single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for
wounds. It restores the HP of
one Pokémon by 200 points.

name: Super Potion
description:
A spray-type medicine for
wounds. It restores the HP of
one Pokémon by 50 points.

name: Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a
fainted Pokémon. It restores half the
Pokémon's maximum HP.

name: Max Revive
description:
A medicine that revives a
fainted Pokémon. It fully restores the
Pokémon's HP.

name: Fresh Water
description:
Water with a high mineral
content. It restores the HP of
one Pokémon by 50 points.

name: Soda Pop
description:
A fizzy soda drink. It
restores the HP of one Pokémon
by 60 points.

name: Lemonade
description:
A very sweet drink. It
restores the HP of one Pokémon
by 80 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description:
Milk with a very high nutrition
content. It restores the HP of one
Pokémon by 100 points.

name: Ether
description:
It restores the PP of a Pokémon's
selected move by a maximum
of 10 points.

name: Max Ether
description:
It fully restores the PP of a
single selected move that has been
learned by the target Pokémon.

name: Leppa Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon, it
restores a move's PP by 10.

name: Oran Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon, it
heals the user by just 10 HP.

name: Sitrus Berry
description:
If held by a Pokémon, it
heals the user's HP a little.
